    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_437</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Curvas en coordenadas polares</string>
            <string language="en">Curves in polar coordinates</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kurven in den polaren Koordinaten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Courbes dans des coordonnées polaires</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Curvas em coordenadas polares</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Curve nelle coordinate polari</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καμπύλες στις πολικές συντεταγμένες</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones las gráficas de curvas en coordenadas polares. Se estudia su definición y trazado y algunos ejemplos de curvas en polares como, por ejemplo, la cardiode.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to draw the graphs of curves in polar coordinates. It studies the definition and drawing of these curves with examples such as the cardioid.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">polares</string>
            <string language="en">polar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">ángulo</string>
            <string language="en">angle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">cardioide</string>
            <string language="en">cardioid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">polo</string>
            <string language="en">pole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">coordenadas</string>
            <string language="en">coordinates</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">curvas</string>
            <string language="en">curves</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, die Diagramme der Kurven in den polaren Koordinaten zu 
zeichnen. Sie studiert die Definition und das Zeichnen dieser 
Kurven mit Beispielen wie dem cardioid.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations de tracer les graphiques des courbes dans des coordonnées
polaires. Elle étudie la définition et le dessin de ces 
courbes avec des exemples tels que le cardioid.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações desenhar 
os gráficos das curvas em coordenadas polares. Estuda a 
definição e desenhar destas curvas com exemplos tais como o 
cardioid.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
tracciare i grafici delle curve nelle coordinate polari. Studia 
la definizione e dissipare di queste curve con gli esempi quale il 
cardioid.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να σύρει τις γραφικές παραστάσεις των καμπυλών στις πολικές 
συντεταγμένες. Μελετά τον καθορισμό και το σχέδιο αυτών των
καμπυλών με τα παραδείγματα όπως ο καρδιώδης.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">polar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Winkel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">cardioid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
